definition: lit. to fall behind Sun Shan 孫山|孙山[Sun1 Shan1] (who came last in the imperial examination) (idiom)/fig. to fail an exam/to fall behind (in a competition)
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
grandson/descendant
surname Sun
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan

sentences.english: This year he failed again in the entrance examination for college students.
sentences.chinese: 今年高考他又名落孫山了。

sentences.english: However, there are still about 30% of the students fallen off.
sentences.chinese: 但是，還是有30%左右的學生名落孫山。

definition: lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
fight to the death/desperate struggle
to be drowned (figurative and literal)
to prevail upon/to coax
to speak face to face/meeting/interview
running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops
to make a breakthrough
to shoot without aim (idiom); fig. to speak without thinking/firing blindly/to shoot in the air/a shot in the dark
Guoxing or Kuohsing township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
fight a battle of words/cross verbal swords
switchboard operator
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
to disobey
to seize power
British Commonwealth of Nations
Zhou Ji (1781-1839), Qing writer and poet
help to the needy/emergency relief/charity/to give to poorer relative/(also 賙濟|赒济)
